sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; class Projects extends Component { render() { return (
Projects
{/* PROJECT CARD */} {projects.map((project, index) => (
{/* LEFT DATE */}

{project.duration}

{project.teamSize}
{/* RIGHT CONTENT */}
{project.name}

Environment: {project.environment}

{project.description}

    {project.responsibilities.map((r, i) => (
  • {r}
    • ))}
))}
); } } export default Projects; /* ---------------- PROJECT DATA ---------------- */ const projects = [ { name: "Max Words", duration: "Oct 2018 – Jan 2019", teamSize: "Team Size: 1", environment: "React Native, MySQL", description: "Word-building game application.", responsibilities: [ "Developed mobile app using React Native", "API integration for game data", "Backend API support", ], }, { name: "Sports Fans", duration: "Jan 2019 – Feb 2020", teamSize: "Team Size: 2", environment: "React Native, Node.js, GraphQL", description: "Sports-focused app with video calls, chat, media storage.", responsibilities: [ "Developed React Native application", "GraphQL queries and data handling", ], }, { name: "MenuMD", duration: "Feb 2019 – Jun 2019", teamSize: "Team Size: 1", environment: "React Native, GraphQL", description: "Restaurant discovery app.", responsibilities: [ "Designed database schema", "Implemented Google Maps integration", "Analytics and GraphQL APIs", ], }, { name: "GamePe Wallet", duration: "Feb 2023 – Mar 2023", teamSize: "Team Size: 4", environment: "React Native, Blockchain", description: "Crypto wallet supporting multiple currencies.", responsibilities: [ "Frontend lead", "Blockchain integrations", "State management with hooks", ], }, { name: "Improve MG / CIDP", duration: "Mar 2023 – Oct 2023", teamSize: "Team Size: 8", environment: "React Native, Firebase, AWS, Apple HealthKit", description: "Healthcare apps for neurological disorder patients.", responsibilities: [ "Led React Native team", "Apple HealthKit integration", "Push notifications & analytics", "Audio/video recording features", ], }, { name: "Trusted Bank", duration: "Nov 2025 – Present", teamSize: "Team Size: 2", environment: "React Native, .NET, Fineract", description: "Mobile banking application.", responsibilities: [ "Tech Lead for mobile development", "Account, Loan & Deposit modules", "Fineract SDK integration", ], }, ];
